name: RocketDrill
description:
Build up speed to crash through asteroids without flying out of control.

Grey asteroids will turn green when you are moving fast enough to break them, avoid them until then.

Red asteroids can never be destroyed, avoid them at all costs.

Each time you smash an asteroid, bigger asteroids will start spawning.

CONTROLS:

  • Accelerate - W / Up Arrow
  • Turn - A and D / Left and Right arrows
  • Break - S / Down arrow
